patthana20.9:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana20.9:2.1_0: Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.9:3.1_0: Nasaraṇañca naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.9:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana20.9:5.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana20.9:5.1_1: Naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana20.9:8.1_0: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:9.1_0: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:9.1_1: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:9.1_2: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:10.1_0: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:10.1_1: Nasaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana20.9:11.1_0: Naaraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.9:11.1_1: Naaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana20.9:13.1_0: Nasaraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo,
patthana20.9:15.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ,
